tool_description: A tool designed for App Inventor to store and retrieve values using a simple API.

api_list.name: getvalue
api_list.description: Retrieves a value associated with a specific tag.

required_parameters.name: tag
required_parameters.description: The identifier for the value you want to retrieve.

api_list.name: storeavalue
api_list.description: Stores a value with a specific tag for later retrieval.

required_parameters.name: tag
required_parameters.description: The identifier under which the value will be stored.
